name: European Solidarity Corps
description: The European Solidarity Corps is the new initiative from the European Union to enable young people aged 18 to 30 to engage in solidarity-related projects around Europe. This could be as a volunteer, trainee or even as a paid employee working on a solidarity-themed project. In this release you can:  Login using the same EU Login account or social media account that you used to create your European Solidarity Corps registration.  View and edit your European Solidarity Corps profile   Link through to Learning Resources in the main European Solidarity Corps website.  View the photo journal entries of other registered candidates and participants in the Community section and comment & like these journal entries.  Create your own journal entries and share them with other participants on Facebook and Instagram.  Receive notifications when another registered candidate or participant has liked or commented your post.  Search and apply for opportunities   Browse the Frequently Asked Questions, and send us a question if these do not give you the answer you are looking for. We would like to get your feedback on how to improve it for future releases. There is a link to a survey on the main page which we would be grateful if you take 5 minutes to complete.
